About Me

I am a hardworking and motivated individual, with a strong interest in pursuing a career in cyber security. Currently, I am studying a Foundation T-Level in Digital. I take an organized and reliable approach to my work, always striving to complete tasks to the highest possible standard.

"I develop software and study cybersecurity, blending my code craftsmanship with a passion for ethical hacking."
- Kieran Pritchard
